desc: South Asia News: A veteran Bangladesh politician, Bangladesh Awami League senior leader Ramesh Chandra Sen died on Saturday while in custody at Dinajpur District Jail..

title: Israel’s president to mourn antisemitic massacre in Australia, where fury over Gaza still divides
desc: Israeli President Isaac Herzog will receive two very different receptions when he arrives in Australia on Monday – a warm welcome by a government determined to show solidarity with its grieving Jewish minority, and mass protests by activists who consider him a war criminal.
